NEIST Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Doctor Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 19, 2025, 10:41 IST
 Council of Scientific & Industrial Research
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 19-Aug-2025 |  Assam |  Salary : 46,020 to 46,020




FOLLOW

North East Institute of Science and Technology, Jorhat (NEIST) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Doctor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS can grab this chance and apply for the NEIST Recruitment 2025. Here we mentioned the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the application form on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more Jobs in Assam.

NEIST Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Doctor	01	MBBS

Age Limit for the NEIST Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 65 years.

Selection Process for the NEIST Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the NEIST Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 46,020 /- per month.

Application fee for the NEIST Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the NEIST Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Doctor notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form along with the required documents to the address given below.

Address

Controller of Administration CSIR-NEIST (RRL), P.O. – RRL Jorhat, P.S.- Pulibor, Dist- Jorhat, Assam-785006, and e-mail to ao@neist.res.in.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	14-08-2025
Last Date of Application	21-08-2025

 

Application form	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
